org.jetel.component.partition

Class PartitionFunctionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.component.partition.PartitionFunctionFactory

  • public class PartitionFunctionFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This factory provides PartitionFunction implementation based on various settings. The factory is used directly from Partition component and PartitionWriter component.
